card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: None"Quick Draw" â€” Action: Exhaust Hawkeye â†’ ready Hawkeye's bow.
"I may not be the mightiest Avenger, but I'm definitely the coolest."

alternate.name: Clint Barton
alternate.property: NoneWeapon of Choice â€” Action: Spend 1 resource of any type â†’ search your deck and discard pile for Hawkeye's Bow and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase).

card.name: Hawkeye's Bow
card.property: NoneRestricted. Your hero gets +1 ATK and each of your [[arrow]] attacks gain ranged.

card.name: Hawkeye's Quiver
card.property: NoneYou may play [[arrow]] events attached to this card as if they were in your hand. Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Quiver â†’ search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[arrow]] event and attach it faceup to this card.

card.name: Mockingbird
card.property: NoneInterrupt: When the villain initiates an attack against you, spend 1 resource of any type and return Mockingbird to your hand â†’ prevent all damage from this attack.
"Is that all you got?"

card.name: Sonic Arrow
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ confuse an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already confused)
EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!

card.name: Explosive Arrow
card.property: NoneHero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow and choose a player â†’ deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.
"Anyone ever tell you how your eyes sparkle when you're angry?" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Electric Arrow
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ stun an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already stunned).
"Hail Hawkeye!" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Cable Arrow
card.property: NoneHero Action (thwart): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring any crisis icons in play.
"It's a great way to get around." -- Clint Barton

card.name: Vibranium Arrow
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow â†’ deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Expert Marksman
card.property: NoneResource: Exhaust Expert Marksman â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an [[arrow]] event.
"When you fight alongside gods and monsters, it's not enough to be great; you have to the best." -- Clint Barton

card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: NoneAction: Exhaust this ally and discard 1 card from your hand â†’ deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the number of printed resources on that card.
"You see I', literally pointing arrows at your, right?."

card.name: Black Knight
card.property: NoneBlack Knight's basic attack gains piercing.
"As long as the Black Blade blazes darkly in my hand, I must fight on."

card.name: Goliath
card.property: NoneAction: Goliath gets +4 ATK until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Goliath. (Max once per phase.)
"Sometimes being a gentleman means holding the door, and the rest of the building."

card.name: U.S. Agent
card.property: NoneRetaliate 1.
"Cap isn't the only solider who loves his country."

card.name: Sky Cycle
card.property: NoneAttach to an [[Avenger]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gains [[Aerial]]. Action: Exhaust Sky Cycle â†’ ready attached ally.

card.name: Team Training
card.property: NonePlay under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Each ally you control gets +1 hit point.
"We mostly just wait for Cap to yell 'Avengers Aseemble' and attack in the same direction as him" -- Clint Barton

card.name: Ready for Action
card.property: NoneHero Action: Give an ally you control a tough status card.
"Try that again. I dare you." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: War Machine
card.property: NoneToughness. War Machine's basic attack gains ranged.

card.name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
card.property: NoneHero Action: Exhaust an [[avenger]] character you control â†’ ready another [[avenger]] character you control.
"We come together to fight what can't be fought alone." -- Luke Cage

card.name: Spider-Woman
card.property: None"Superhuman Agility" â€” Interrupt: When you play an aspect card, Spider-Woman gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF until the end of the round. (limit once per round for each aspect.)

alternate.name: Jessica Drew
alternate.property: NoneDouble Agent â€” Choose two aspects instead of one during deck-building. You must include an equal number of cards from those aspects in your deck. Action:: Look at the top card of any deck. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Captain Marvel
card.property: NoneResponse: After Captain Marvel uses a basic power, draw 1 card.
"I gotta hand it to you, kid. This is one of the more impressive messes I've ever seen."

card.name: Finesse
card.property: NoneHero Resource: Exhaust Finesse â†’ generate a [wild] resource for an aspect card.

card.name: Jessica Drew's Apartment
card.property: NoneAlter-Ego Action: Exhaust Jessica Drew's Apartment â†’ search the top 5 cards of your deck for an aspect card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Venom Blast
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Pheromones
card.property: NoneHero Action: Stun and confuse an enemy.
"Warn me before you use that power again, okay?" -- Peter Parker

card.name: Contaminant Immunity
card.property: NoneHero Action: Heal 3 damage from Spider-Woman and give her a tough status card.

card.name: Inconspicuous
card.property: NoneHero Action (thwart): Remove a total of 3 threat from among schemes in play.
"Now all I gotta do is Spy-der Woman my way inside." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Self-Propelled Glide
card.property: NoneHero Action: Ready Spider-Woman. She gains [[aerial]] until the end of the round.
"People always think I can fly. I can't But I do glide really well." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Spider-Girl
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play Spider-Girl from your hand, stun and confuse a minion.
"Alright you bunch of losers. Who wants a piece of me?."

card.name: Press the Advantage
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is stunned or confused, draw 1 card.
"You are in Wakanda now!" -- T'Challa

card.name: Piercing Strike
card.property: NoneHero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: Spider-Man
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, remove 3 [per_hero] threat from a side scheme.
"Seriously, what is it with New York? Would it kill you to invade Denver once?."

card.name: Skilled Investigator
card.property: NonePlay under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After a side scheme is defeated, exhaust Skilled Investigator â†’ draw 1 card.

card.name: Clear the Area
card.property: NoneHero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, draw 1 card.

card.name: Laser Cannon

card.property: NoneAlter-Ego Action Exhaust your alter-ego and spend a [mental] resource â†’ discard this card.

card.property:
NoneForced Response: At the end of your turn, take 1 damage if you are in hero form.

card.name: Martial Law

NoneYour hand size is reduced by 1.

NoneGive to the Clint Barton Player.

Crossfire's attacks gain piercing. Quickstrike.

card.name: Crossfire's Rifle
card.property:
When attached enemy attacks, the attack gains ranged. Attach to Crossfire. Otherwise, attach to the villain.

NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 3 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Hydra Regular
card.property: NoneIncite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
"When you consider what kind of person would join a terrorist organization bent on world domination, it's easy to see why Hydra's troops don't impress." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Hail Hydra!
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero attacks that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: Crossbones
card.property: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.)
"I consider myself a craftsman. I specialize in destruction and terror."

card.name: Crossbones
card.property: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Crossbone's Machine Gun and attach it to Crossbones. Shuffle the encounter deck.

card.name: Crossbones
card.property: While Crossbones has a Weapon attachment, his attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
"Those super-powered types might have more strength, but none of them have my style."

card.name: Attack on Mount Athena
card.property: Contents: Crossbones (I) and Crossbones (II). Crossbones, Experimental Weapons, and Standard Encounter sets. Three modular sets (Hydra Assault, Weapon Master, and Legions of Hydra).\nSetup: Create the Experimental Weapons deck and set it next to the main scheme deck. (see rulebook page 5.)

alternate.name: Attack on Mount Athena
alternate.property: Crossbones is leading an army of Hydra soldiers in a direct assault on the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility in the Adirondack Mountains.

card.name: The Infinity Stone
card.property: Inside the Project P.E.G.A.S.U.S. facility, S.H.I.E.L.D. agents fight desperatly to prevent Hydra from obtaining the Reality Stone stored within.

alternate.name: The Infinity Stone
alternate.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.

card.name: The Getaway
card.property: Hydra has seized the Infinity Stone, and Crossbones orders their withdrawal. You must stop them before they escape!

alternate.name: The Getaway
alternate.property:
NoneWhen Revealed: Reveal the top card of the Experimental Weapons deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Crossbones' Machine Gun
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones attacks you, remove 1 ammo counter from this card and discard the top card of the encounter deck â†’ take indirect damage equal to the number of boost icons on the discarded card. Attach to Crossbones. Uses (2[per_hero] ammo counters).

card.name: Crossbones' Armor
card.property:
NoneAttach to Crossbones.
Forced Interrupt: When Crossbones would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. If there is 5 or more damage here, discard Crossbones' Armor.

card.name: Hydra Bomber
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 threat on the main scheme.
"I know that if you cut off one head, two more will take its place. But what if it blows up instead?" -- She-Hulk

card.name: Full Auto
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Surge.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is Crossbones' ATK. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.name: Hard as Nails
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead. Give the villain a tough status card. If you cannot, heal 3 damage from it instead.

card.property:
NoneIncite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Weapon attachment is discarded. Reveal that card.

card.name: Crossbones' Assault
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: Crossbones activates against the player who defeated this scheme.
Crossbones is a heartless killer, but he's not a psychopath. His assault on P.E.G.A.S.U.S. is ruthless and efficient.

card.name: Cornered Staff
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Discard 1[per_hero] cards from the top of the encounter deck. Place 1 additional threat here for each boost icon discarded this way.

card.property:

NoneAttach to the villain.

NoneAttach to the villain.

card.name: Absorbing Man
card.property: NoneAbsorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.

card.name: Absorbing Man
card.property:
NoneAbsorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.

card.name: Absorbing Man
card.property:
Forced Response: After Absorbing Man activates against you, if he has the:
Â·Ice or Stone trait, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
Â·Metal or Wood trait, take 1 indirect damage. Absorbing Man gains the trait of each environment in play.

card.name: None Shall Pass
card.property: Contents: Absorbing Man (I) and Absorbing Man (II). Absorbing Man and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Hydra Patrol).\nSetup: Discard cards from the encounter deck until an environment is discarded. Put that card into play and shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

alternate.name: None Shall Pass
alternate.property:
None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 delay counter here.
Forced Interrupt: When an environment enters play, discard each other environment card in play.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Dense Forest
card.property:
NoneSurge.

card.name: Snowy Hillside
card.property:
NoneSurge.

card.name: Rocky Outcrop

NoneSurge.

card.name: Abandoned Facility
card.property:
NoneSurge.

card.name: Ball and Chain
card.property:
NoneAttach to Absorbing Man.

card.name: Stall Tactics
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for every 2 delay counters on the main scheme. If no threat was placed this way, this card gains surge. If there are 5 or more delay counters on the main scheme, take 1 indirect damage.

card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Absorbing Man schemes. If Absorbing Man has the Stone trait, he gets +1 SCH for this activation.

card.name: Steel Kick

NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 2 threat on the main scheme (3 threat instead if Absorbing Man has the Metal trait.)

card.name: Piercing Thorns

card.name: Omni-Morph Duplication
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed: If Absorbing Man has the:
Â·Ice trait, exhaust your identity.

Â·Stone trait, give Absorbing Man 1 facedown boost card. Â·Wood trait, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

card.name: Icy Grip

card.name: Avalanche!

card.name: Super Absorbing Power
card.property: NoneAbsorbing Man gains the Ice, Metal, Stone, and Wood traits. Reveal this card.
Creel has the ability to absorb the properties of multiple elements at once, but it requires intense concentration.

card.name: Taskmaster
card.property: NoneForced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.
"There's nothing you can do that I can't do better."

card.name: Taskmaster
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

card.name: Taskmaster
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
Forced Response: After a player changes to hero form, they discard the top card of the encounter deck and take damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.

card.name: Hunting Down Heroes
card.property: Contents: Taskmaster (I) and Taskmaster (II). Taskmaster, Hydra Patrol, and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Weapon Master).\nSetup: Set each Captive ally aside out of play. Search the encounter deck for Hydra Patrol and put it into play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

alternate.name: Hunting Down Heroes
alternate.property:
None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player in hero form must choose to either place 1 threat here or take 1 damage.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
The notorious Taskmaster has been appointed by Hydra'c chief of police. His top priority is hunting down the outlaw heroes.

card.name: Moon Knight
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play Moon Knight from your hand, spend a [wild] resource â†’ draw 2 cards.
"Hydra took over so fast, I wasn't sure they were real."

card.name: Shang-Chi
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play Shang-Chi from your hand, spend a [energy] resource â†’ stun an enemy.

card.name: White Tiger
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play White Tiger from your hand, spend [mental] resource â†’ remove 3 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Elektra
card.property: NoneResponse: After you play Elektra from your hand, spend a [physical] resource â†’ deal 3 damage to an enemy.
"I got caught when I tried to help some civilians escape a Hydra Patrol. Turns out the civilians were Hydra agents running a sting operation."

card.name: Hydra Hunter
card.property:
Hydra's Hunter's attacks gain piercing and ranged.
If you are in hero form, take 1 damage. Otherwise place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Taskmaster's Sword
card.property:
Taskmaster's attacks gain piercing. Attach to Taskmaster.

card.name: Taskmaster's Shield
card.property:
NoneAttach to Taskmaster.

card.name: Photographic Reflexes
card.property:
NoneAttach to Taskmaster.
Forced Interrupt: when a player attacks Taskmaster, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Taskmaster and deal an equal amount of damage to that player's identity instead. Then, discard Photographic Reflexes. (Max once per attack.)

card.name: Mimicry
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If a Thwart card was discarded this way, Taskmaster schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If an Attack card was discarded this way, Taskmaster attacks you.

card.name: Hunted by Hydra
card.property:
NoneIncite 1. (When this card is revealed place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
When Revealed: Each player in hero form takes 1 damage and discards 1 card at random from their hand.
"It's a bad time to be a hero." -- Bucky Barnes

card.name: Captured by Hydra
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Place 1 random set-aside Captive ally facedown beneath this scheme. When this scheme is defeated, the player who defeated it takes that ally into their hand and removes this scheme from the game.

card.name: Taskmaster's Training Camp
card.property: NoneForced Response: After a minion enters play, give it a tough status card.
Taskmaster only accepts the best troops into his police force. before a Hydra soldier can enlist, they must survive his training camp.

card.name: Zola
card.property: NoneRetaliate 1.
"My mutate program will transform these pathetic creatures into Hydra's elite shock-troops!"

card.name: Zola
card.property:
NoneRetaliate 1.
When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Test Subjects side scheme and reveal it.
(Shuffle the encounter deck.)

card.name: Zola
card.property:
NoneRetaliate 1.
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. (Shuffle the encounter deck.)

card.name: The Island of Dr. Zola
card.property: Contents: Zola (I) and Zola (II). Zola and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Under Attack)\nSetup: Search the encounter deck for Hydra Prison and reveal it. Each player searches the encounter deck for a copy of Ultimate Bio-Servant and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.

alternate.name: The Island of Dr. Zola
alternate.property: None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.

card.name: The Mad Doctor
card.property: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a minion and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Zola's mutates attack you with blind obedience and savage fury. IT's up to you to put an end to this nightmare before the mad doctor unleashes them upon the world!

alternate.name: The Mad Doctor
alternate.property:
None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, place 1 test counter here. Then, if there are 3 or more test counters here, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player and remove 3 test counters from this scheme.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: Ultimate Bio-Servant
card.property: Ultimate Bio-Servant gets +1 ATK for each attachment on it. Toughness. Give the villain a tough status card.

card.name: Zola's Mutate
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Tech attachment is discarded. Attach that card to Zola's Mutate. Shuffle Zola's Mutate into the encounter deck.

card.name: Berserk Mutate
card.property: NoneQuickstrike. Place 1 test counter on the main scheme. For each test counter on the main scheme, Zola gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for this activation.

card.name: Defensive Programming
card.property:
NoneAttach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Defensive Programming attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains guard.

card.name: Pain Inhibitors
card.property:
NoneAttach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Pain Inhibitors attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains retaliate 1.

card.name: Neurological Implants
card.property:
NoneAttach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Neurological Implants attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
Attached minion gets +2 hit points.

card.name: Mind Ray
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Zola schemes. You are confused.
When Revealed (Hero): Zola attacks you. You are stunned.
"You thought Zola defenseless? You arrogant fool!" -- Arnim Zola

card.name: Technological Enhancements
card.property:
NoneIncite 1.
When Revealed: Place 1 test counter on the main scheme. Place 1 test counter on the main scheme.

card.name: Hydra Prison
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed: Each player searches their deck, discard pile and hand for a hero-specific ally and places it facedown beneath this scheme. Place X threat on this scheme where X is the total cost of all allies beneath it. Each player shuffles their deck.
When Defeated: remove this scheme from the game and return each ally beneath it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Test Subjects
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: The first player discards cards from the top of the encounter deck until they discard a minion. Reveal that minion.
It is a fate rose than death.

card.name: Zola's Experiments
card.property: NoneForced Response: After a minion enters play, attach the topmost Tech attachment in the encounter discard pile to that minion.
The mad doctor never grows tired of experimenting on his victims.

card.name: Red Skull
card.property: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play.
"Freedom is only for the one who rules! All others must be slaves!"

card.name: Red Skull
card.property: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
"No one will stand in the way of my plans!"

card.name: Red Skull
card.property: Red Skull gets +1 ATK for each side scheme in play. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
"The world will bow to Red Skull!"

card.name: The Rise of the Red Skull
card.property: Contents: Red Skull (I) and Red Skull (II). Red Skull and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Hydra Assault and Hydra Patrol).\nSetup: Put the Red House into play. Shuffle every other side scheme into the side-scheme deck and set it next to the encounter deck (see insert).\nSet The Sleeper aside, out of play.

alternate.name: The Rise of the Red Skull
alternate.property: None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
Red Skull plans to conquer the world with the power of the Reality Stone. He uses his strategic genius to keep you busy while he works towards his goal.

card.name: New World Hydra
card.property: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
The Red Skull is one step closer to unlocking the full power of the Infinity Stone. You need to stop him before he does, and all reality is bent to his evil will.

alternate.name: New World Hydra
alternate.property:
None[star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, reveal the top card of the side-scheme deck and put it into play.
If this scheme is completed, the players lose the game.

card.name: The Sleeper
card.property:
NoneGuard. Retaliate 1. Toughness.
When Revealed: The Sleeper engages the first player.
When Defeated: Remove The Sleeper from the game.

card.name: Hydra Exo-Soldier
card.property: NoneToughness. Give the villain a tough status card and another boost card.
"Careful, team. These guys pack a punch!" -- Captain America

card.name: Red Skull's Luger
card.property:
Red Skull's attacks gain piercing and ranged. Attach to Red Skull.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resource â†’ discard this card. Attach to Red Skull.

card.name: Red Skull's Right Hook
card.property:
NoneAttach to Red Skull.
Red Skull gains retaliate 1.
Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources â†’ discard this card.
"I am your superior in every way!" -- Red Skull

card.name: Master Strategist
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Red Skull activates, give him an additional boost card for each side scheme in play. Then, discard this card. (Max once per activation.) Attach to Red Skull.
"In chess, the only piece that truly matters is the King, and that's me." -- Red Skull

card.name: Twisted Reality
card.property:
NoneIncite 1.
Attach to a side scheme.
Forced Response: When attached side scheme is defeated, deal the first player an encounter card.
The Infinity Stone gives Red Skull the power to bend reality to his will.

card.name: Bitter Rival
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Exhaust a character you control for each side scheme in play. Exhaust a character you control.
"This is the end for you, Herr Captain!" -- Red Skull

card.name: Spreading Lies
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme in play. Give Red Skull a tough status card.
"With my great and unmatched cunning, Hydra will reign supreme!" -- Red Skull

card.name: Infinite Power
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull schemes.
When Revealed (Hero): Give Red Skull a tough status card. Red Skull attacks you.

card.name: The Red House
card.property:
NoneRed Skull cannot take damage.
Interrupt: When a character thwarts this side scheme, they may use their ATK instead of their THW.
Red Skull built his fortress over the White House as a symbol of Hydra's conquest over America.

card.name: The Sleeper Awakened
card.property:
NoneThis scheme cannot leave play while The Sleeper is in play.
When Revealed: Put The Sleeper into play engaged with the first player. When The Sleeper is defeated, remove this card from the game.
Rising from the Potomac River, The Sleeper has awakened to answer Red Skull's summons.

card.name: Prison Camps
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme searches their deck and discard pile for an ally, puts it into play, and shuffles their deck.
Under Hydra's rule, families are separated and incarcerated without due process.

card.name: Censor the Past
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: Each player chooses up to 3 cards in their discard pile and shuffles them into their deck.
Hydra controls all media outlets and uses propaganda to turn the masses against the heroes of the past.

card.name: Hydra Reinforcements
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme discards a non-Elite minion.
What Hydra lacks in skill, they make up for with sheer numbers.

card.name: Mass Chaos
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Each player discards the top 5 cards of their deck and places 1 threat here for each different type of resource icon ([energy],[mental],[physical], or [wild]) they discarded this way.
Red Skull creates catastrophes across the country to keep his enemies busy.

card.name: Hydra Flame-Soldier
card.property: Forced Response: After Hydra Flame-Soldier makes an undefended attack against you, discard a support you control. If this card resolves during an undefended attack, discard a support you control.

card.name: Hydra Jet-Trooper
card.property: NoneQuickstrike. If you are in hero form, the villain attacks you after this activation. Do not deal any boost cards for that attack.

card.name: Hail Hydra!
card.property: NoneWhen Revealed: Each Hydra minion engaged with a hero makes an attack against that hero. Each player who was not attacked this way searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion, puts it into play engaged with them, and shuffles the encounter deck.

card.name: Combat Knife
card.property:
Attached villain's attacks gain piercing. Attach to the villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Hydra Sidearm
card.property:
Forced Interrupt: When attached villain attacks, the attack gains ranged. Attach to the Villain.
Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Weapon Master
card.property:
NoneWhen Reveled (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. If they have a Weapon attachment, this card gains surge.
When Reveled (Hero): the villain attacks you. If they have a Weapon attachment, this card gains surge.

card.name: Concussion Grenade
card.property:
NoneWhen Revealed (Alter-Ego): You are confused. Place 1 threat on the main scheme (2 threat instead if you were already confused).
When Revealed (Hero): You are stunned. Deal 1 damage to your hero (2 instead if you were already stunned).

card.name: Hydra Regular
card.property: NoneIncite 1. (When this card is revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)
"When you consider the kind of person would join a terrorist organization bent on world domination, it's easy to see why Hydra's troops don't impress." -- Jessica Drew

card.name: Hydra Soldier
card.property:
NoneGuard.(While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)
Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

card.name: Hydra Patrol
card.property: NoneWhen Defeated: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a Hydra minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Hydra Soldiers perform routine patrols to maintain control of their territory.
